title: Zyra no longer viable in mid lane
body:
The recent change to the plant ai has taken zyra completely out of mid lane. She is no longer viable as an apc. 

It's extremely frustrating that Riot has done this since in the mage update, they promised that they would always balance her with mid lane in mind since the majority of zyra mains like playing her mid. Unfortunately, this latest change has absolutely crushed her mid lane presence. She's being balanced as if she is a support only champion.

This is a slap in the face to zyra mains who were told by Riot that they would respect her mid mage origins.
_________

Edit: This blew up a little bit, so I want to expand on the problems. Some people are saying "just land your skills and it's no problem," but it's clear they don't play Zyra much.

Here's the problem with that logic -- During the rework, Riot specifically made it so that she gets the most damage out of procing multiple seeds at once, but she has no control over where her passive seeds spawn. So you can either proc the w seeds you put down and hit a champion, or you can hit the highest concentration of seeds, but they won't hit your enemy.

The other major issue here is that she is a zone mage with a slow aa missile speed. If she misses a skillshot, she's now required to throw a slow aa at the enemy champ to get her plants to attack them. Meanwhile, the enemy champion can start advancing on her, knowing that her primary source of damage won't do shit to them and that she has LONG cds to boot.

replies.body: I'll keep saying it, Riot needs to pull power out of Zyra's bases and give her actual ratios. A mage needing 760 AP to double the damage on their main damage ability is always going to end with a champ who can utterly ignore AP. In this case it means Zyra goes support and never buys over 200 AP.

Last I checked Lulu was always meant to be a support champion and her going mid was unintended.  This is fairly different from Zyra which was released as a mid champion and then taken down bot lane because she was an incredibly effective support.

Lulu was never meant to be a mid laner.
She was a support and once a champion's secondary role becomes their primary, is the time when you know there's something fishy going on. Riot didn't have a problem that Lulu found her way to mid but Lulu was doing way too much on mid, considering that all of her utility she could have used on herself and clear waves without a problem + harass. Ganking a Lulu was pretty much next to impossible and you'd have to commit a lot of resources for that kill.

Ironically this should've been the first change after MYMU to make her mid lane FAIR.

You know, her plants' AI is suppose to attack champion only if:
1. They are the closest target.
2. They were recently affected by Zyra's spells or basic attacks.

The fact they were always auto-aiming champions in range, made her completely noninteractive in lane.
Not even Azir at his prime and Lux would be able to bully her, and they are the most cancerous lane bullies.

Also say a teamfight is happening with some super mobile enemies, say graves/fiora or something and I run and spawn plants with ryali in the attempt to slow them and get away from their .9 second gap closer...will the plants just troll me and do nothing while they one shot me?

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE RIOT, give Zyra her old Q back please. It's been a year, and I still feel super unsatisfied using that rectangular shape. I promise that if you give her old CIRCULAR Q shape back, she will be a bit better in mid lane. Rectangular shape = shorter range, harder to hit, and unsatisfied to use. Just why are you changing it? to summon multiple plants out and kill enemies right and not intent to land it right? So please revert it back to circular shape if you want Zyra to hit her spell and also feel more rewarding as a zoning mage.

Zyra's passive makes more plants, so her Q is remodeled to hit more plants.

Like, I don't get people...honestly...

The problem is now Zyras Q is now much harder to hit and 80% of the time you use it solely for the purpose of summoning plants. Back then you actually had to aim your Q to hit the enemy champion and plan your seeds well. Now its "ooh my passive made a seed 300 units away from the enemy. Better Q the seed instead of him"

She's designed to play into her plants by staying in a general area, passively making a ton of seeds, and then punishing people that get near those seeds. She isn't someone that goes well out of her way to pummel people unless she's fed. Rather, she sets up a "garden" and unleashes it when enemies enter it.

To do this effectively, they reduced the damage on her spells while increasing possible damage by increasing the number of plants she'll have on the field at one time. Play into her passive and you bank reward. Don't and you don't. Only difference is that you need to hit the champs you want to be attacked by the plants for your cast to triple down on someone, rather than just doing 1/2 the work for you. The logic in the design is very much there. People just want to complain.

You probably never played pre-rework Zyra havent you? Still the same, expect she had less seeds and had to actually LAND her skills to do any real damage. Right now Zyra is pretty much a brain dead champion where you plan seeds and let the AI do the work for you. It is neither healthy nor takes much skills. But of course if its brain dead champions thats suit you, then i guess i cant complain

This is exactly why they changed the plant AI though: If you miss your skill, your plant doesn't prioritize your target.

Pre-rework Zyra had a ton of issues concerning her plant AI to the point where the plants were just random filler to her standard burst. Riot wanted Zyra to be more about using her plants well and less about just hitting people with skill shots. Any champion can just hit someone with a skill shot, and that's fine because it promotes player skill, but variety becomes appreciable when there's a meaningful difference in game play from one champ to another.

I think the issue is when they reworked her passive, they made the amount of plants she could have super oppressive, which is literally the only reason why this nerf is needed. reduce the spawn rate and keep the ai, spawn less plants.
Yea it really sucks since I've recently taken a liking to playing zyra mid. Short lasted :(
